q: as the Allen Iverson is set to retire from the NBA, according to an online report. Commentator Stephen A. Smith published a statement on his Web site Wednesday attributed to Allen Iverson . It said Allen Iverson plans to retire but also that I feel strongly that I can still compete at the highest level. The statement also said Allen Iverson has tremendous love for the game and the desire to play. "His legacy would be huge," Cleveland Cavaliers All-Star LeBron James said. is a major milestone for her and we're hoping that she crosses through many more," said her neurosurgeon Dr. Peter Michael Lemole. John McCain Kirsten Gillibrand , who was present for the eye opening, said: It was raw courage. It was raw strength. It was so beautiful and so moving. Doctors have also helped Gabrielle Giffords sit up and dangle her legs from her bed. She's able to open her right eye, even though it's bandaged. The next milestone will be removing

her hospital gown. She even scratched her nose, Lemole said. The encouraging news continued when Kirsten Gillibrand and Rep. Debbie Wasserman Schultz , D-Fla., stood in the hospital room Wednesday, talking, joking and touching their friend. She was rubbing our hands and gripping our hands so... we knew she could hear and understand what we were saying and she moved her leg, and so we knew she was responding, Kirsten Gillibrand said. "And the more we joked about what we were going to do, she started to open her eyes." Gabrielle Giffords ' husband, Mark Kelly, realized the significance of the moment. "

It is the same faith and credit that enables us to borrow from rich people and from China and from other countries. As you well know, in the history of this country, the United States has never defaulted on one penny owed to a creditor. Were you excited to discover that your character in Tangled provides a lot of the comedy of the movie? I was incredibly happy, but I have to admit that the animals definitely steal the show. When it comes to the comedy of Tangled, the gecko and the horse are outstanding. W.C. Fields said never work with kids or animals, but the gecko and the horse end up stealing my thunder.
